description.value:
Solous enjoys all things that sow discord - friends falling out over a misunderstanding, a mark falling hard for a particularly nasty con, and anything that undermines authority. The Savage Wild will happily bring down a town or even a city towards this end.

Edicts embarrass and expose hypocrites, humble those in power, play pranks and practical jokes

Anathema show remorse for your pranks, take a joke personally

Areas of Concern hunting, disaster, wrath, secrets

publication.title: Player's Guide to Hucaen 1107: Foundry Edition
publication.author: Cornelius
